title: Pork chops with walnut liqueur, prunes and liquorice
description: The combination of walnuts, prunes and liquorice is the perfect accompaniment to pan-fried pork chops. A simple dish perfect for the colder months.
ingredients: 2 x 250g/9oz pork chops, bone in and rind on
2 tsp liquorice paste (available from specialist online retailers)
1 x 215g tin pitted prunes in juice
salt and freshly ground black pepper
